thread.title: With Kevin McCarthy out of the race is it time for Speaker Tom Delay?
thread.title_full: With Kevin McCarthy out of the race is it time for Speaker Tom Delay? - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: With Kevin McCarthy out of the race is it time for Speaker Tom Delay?
text: As CNN reported on Thursday, House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy has dropped out of the race to replace John Boehner as House speaker. Boehner immediately postponed the election, likely because the two other candidates, conservatives both, were not acceptable to him and a considerable portion of the House Republican caucus. Now, House Republicans are scrambling to find a candidate that would be acceptable to both the establishment and conservative wings of the Republican Party, Some are even thinking of looking outside the House for a candidate, something the Constitution allows for. Photo by Ben Sklar/Getty Images
